Key Match Events: Rangers scored 5 runs in the first two innings
Angels' starter Caden Dana chased out of the game with no outs in the second inning
Texas won 7-4 to complete a series win
Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Heaney had received two-or-fewer runs of support in seven straight starts and in 18 of his 27 starts
His team's run support average was the fifth-lowest mark in the American League
Post-Match Reflections: Heaney collected his first win since July 21 against the Orioles
Rangers have won four straight series
Texas is 10-3 since Aug. 28, marking the club's best 13-game stretch since Aug. 3-16, 2023
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rangers have now won four straight series, matching their longest run in 2024
Heaney's five runs of support from the Rangers' offense eclipsed his run support total from his last seven starts combined (four runs)
Manager Bruce Bochy praised Heaney for his consistency and being able to make his starts
Heaney has not spent time on the injured list throughout his two seasons with the Rangers
